revised_title: On the Identity of New Gases Obtained from Cleveite and their Spectral Lines with those in the Chromosphere
tldr: The author investigates the spectral lines of new gases obtained from cleveite and compares them to the lines in the solar chromosphere, finding strong evidence that one of the gases is identical to the gas producing the D3 line in the chromosphere. The study also reveals that several other lines in the spectra of these gases match those in the chromosphere, nebulae, and white stars.
